data.name: Endustry
data.detailed_description:
Endustry is a game about building, exploring and surviving. Build machines and conveyor belts to collect resources. Defend your base with turrets ( Normal mode) or play casually without worrying about enemies ( Casual mode). Keep your base warm and avoid starving.

Features:
  • Casual mode ( No enemies or turrets)
  • Normal mode ( Enemies and turrets)
  • Survival elements
  • Conveyor belts
  • Resource management
  • Randomly generated resources
  • Turret upgrades
  • Enemy waves
data.about_the_game:
Endustry is a game about building, exploring and surviving. Build machines and conveyor belts to collect resources. Defend your base with turrets ( Normal mode) or play casually without worrying about enemies ( Casual mode). Keep your base warm and avoid starving.

Features:
  • Casual mode ( No enemies or turrets)
  • Normal mode ( Enemies and turrets)
  • Survival elements
  • Conveyor belts
  • Resource management
  • Randomly generated resources
  • Turret upgrades

data.short_description: Endustry is a game about building, exploring and surviving. Build machines and conveyor belts to collect resources. Try to survive with or without enemy waves depending on which game mode you play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
